definition: no matter (who, what etc)
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
variant of 管[guan3]
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Would you mind keeping your nose out of my family?
sentences.chinese: 你可以别管我的家事吗？

sentences.english: I wish they would leave us alone and go and arrest some muggers instead.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们别管我们，去逮捕那些行凶抢劫者。

sentences.english: They'll be dancing all night—we'd better just go to bed and let things rip!
sentences.chinese: 他们跳舞会跳通宵的，我们最好去睡觉，别管它。

sentences.english: Forget about the deep meaning and messages in the words, let's talk about who's getting the blade.
sentences.chinese: 别管文字中的深刻含义和信息，让我们谈谈谁与争锋。

sentences.english: Let's forget about our lives for a second and think about a football coach.
sentences.chinese: 我们暂时先别管我们的生活，想想一个足球教练。

sentences.english: The children are getting bigger, Adidas Originals Hardland, there is own viewpoint, we don't tube head pin of.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们大了，有自己的想法，我们就别管头管脚的。

sentences.english: The man yelled out his name and told him to leave him alone.
sentences.chinese: 于是那人大声喊着报幕员儿子的名字，让他别管他。

sentences.english: Giuseppe Conlon: You haven't the maturity to take care of yourself, let alone your mother.
sentences.chinese: 你连照顾自己都不够成熟，别管你妈妈。

sentences.english: or just belittle their argument so much.
She shouted " me "and ran to her room.
sentences.chinese: 她边喊着“别管我”边向她的房间跑去。

sentences.english: When I am in such a mood, Please leave me along and let me write as the pen dictates .
sentences.chinese: 或是处于这样的心境时，请别管我，请让我信笔驰骋。

sentences.english: Only, let me alone, or I shall faint.
sentences.chinese: 只是，别管我，要不我要晕倒啦。

sentences.english: Forget that most of these competitors don’t exist anymore.
sentences.chinese: 别管这些竞争对手大多数都已不复存在。

sentences.english: Those who attended the meeting merely praed about it .
sentences.chinese: 别管公众听证会上的胡扯。

sentences.english: The jurisdiction by level system and the district jurisdiction system shall not apply in arbitration.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁不实行级别管辖和地域管辖。

definition: don’t worry about (it, him etc)/doesn’t matter/whatever/anyway
to do as one sees fit/to play it by ear (according to the circumstances)
to have no right or ability to interfere in sth/it's none of your business!
(dialect) very
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
(coll.) Don't waste your breath./Save it!
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
thus/in this way/like this
don't get involved/ignore it!/don't have anything to do with (him, her etc)/don't speak to
You figure it out for yourself./Do as you please.
(vulgar) trifling matter/mere trifle/goddamn thing/goddamn business
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
